name: jwt-sign
jwt-verify
info:
## input:
on msg.sub assign an a token string like this:


    'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiI...'


## output:
inside msg.sub:



    {
        token: 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiI...',
        decoded: {},
        error: {
            message: 'jwt expired',
            stack: '',
            arguments: null,
            name: 'TokenExpiredError',
            expiredAt: '2023-02-19T07:49:01.000Z'
        }  
    }

// nrlint function-eslint:off

name: hashing compare
crypto-encrypt
info:
## Input
set msg.sub into a string that want to encrypt

    msg.sub = "some random text"

## output
it will produce encrypted text in msg.sub

// nrlint function-eslint:off

name: crypto-dencrypt
info:
## Input
assign msg.sub with encrypted text like:

    msg.sub = "d15cac3ea87e3fca0b51b"

## output
it will produce dencrypted text in msg.sub

// nrlint function-eslint:off

name: mapping result
confirm
prompt: this process will overwriten smart-users data, are you sure ? yes / no

name: set query
func:
msg.topic = `
select
	tab.iOrgID,
	valRef.szValueRef as cCategory,
	tab.szOrgName as ChildName,
	tab.szDescription as ChildDesc,
	parent.iOrgID as ParentID,
	parRef.szValueRef as pCategory,
	parent.szOrgName as ParentName,
	parent.szDescription as ParentDesc
from
	digaportal.oa_organization tab
left join digaportal.oa_organization parent on
	tab.szParentOrgID = parent.iOrgID
left join digaportal.gn_valueref valRef on
	tab.iOrgCatID = valRef.iValueRefID
left join digaportal.gn_valueref parRef on
	parent.iOrgCatID = parRef.iValueRefID
order by
	tab.iOrgID
`;
return msg;

name: function 3
set query
func:
msg.topic = `
select
	szValueRef as label,
	szValueRefDescription as description,
	szCategory as category,
	szCategory2 as category2,
	szCategory3 as category3,
	szCategory4 as category4,
	szCategory5 as category5
from
	gn_valueref gv
order by
	szCategory,
	szCategory2,
	szCategory3,
	szCategory4,
	szCategory5
`;
return msg;
